data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bonyadi-Naeini, Alieh, Rastegar-Pouyani, Nasrullah, Rastegar-Pouyani, Eskandar, Glasby, Christopher J., Rahimian, Hassan (2017): Nereididae (Annelida: Phyllodocida) of the Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman, including description of two new species and 11 new records. Zootaxa 4244 (1): 91-117, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.1.5|23 occurrences
